channel.title: Difficulty with software installation
channel.description: Hi there. I'm new to Axoloti, just got from a friend. I am connecting it to a Windows 10 64bit computer. I have a big question about how to download the software. I read all the Getting Started and it says, download both application bundle and axoloti_runtime go to http://github.com/axoloti/axoloti/releases2.0k, you will see the 'latest release' download axo_runtime_win.(version).msi download axoloti_win_(version).zip When i go to the linked page, the file "axoloti_win_(version).zip" is not there under the entry for 2.0. Where can I find this zip file so that I can follow the correct directions? Thanks STRATEGY

item.title: Difficulty with software installation
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

Do not use 2.0, it is pre-release, and not ready for general use.

Use 1.0.12-2

github.com

Releases Â· axoloti/axoloti

Sketching embedded digital audio. Contribute to axoloti/axoloti development by creating an account on GitHub.

item.title: Difficulty with software installation
item.dc:creator: @strategy
item.description:
@strategy wrote:

Hi there. I'm new to Axoloti, just got from a friend. I am connecting it to a Windows 10 64bit computer. I have a big question about how to download the software. I read all the Getting Started and it says,
download both application bundle and axoloti_runtime
go to http://github.com/axoloti/axoloti/releases2.0k, you will see the 'latest release'
download axo_runtime_win.(version).msi
download axoloti_win_(version).zip

When i go to the linked page, the file "axoloti_win_(version).zip" is not there under the entry for 2.0. Where can I find this zip file so that I can follow the correct directions?
Thanks
STRATEGY
